named-query.name: PaymentPolicy.getPaymentPolicyForMigPaymentType
named-query.query: select paymentPolicy from PaymentPolicy paymentPolicy where paymentPolicy.operatorId=? and paymentPolicy.paymentType=? and paymentPolicy.communityId=?

named-query.name: PaymentPolicy.getPaymentPolicyForNotMigPaymentType
named-query.query: select paymentPolicy from PaymentPolicy paymentPolicy where paymentPolicy.paymentType=? and paymentPolicy.communityId=?

named-query.name: PaymentPolicy.getPaymentPoliciesForCommunity
named-query.query: select paymentPolicy from PaymentPolicy paymentPolicy where paymentPolicy.communityId=?

named-query.name: PaymentPolicy.getPaymentPoliciesByCommunityAndPaymentType
named-query.query: select paymentPolicy from PaymentPolicy paymentPolicy where paymentPolicy.paymentType=? and paymentPolicy.community.id=?
